languages.text: "Но если чувства в вашей душе обратились в пожар, что сжигает изнутри..." {n}Джай подмигивает вам.{/n} "...Можете выразить их, подарив что-нибудь своей скромной слуге".
"But if the feelings in your soul have become a fire that is burning you up from within..." {n}Jae winks at you.{/n} "Then you may express them by bestowing a gift upon your humble servant."
languages.original_text: "Но если чувства в вашей душе обратились в пожар, что сжигает изнутри..." {n}Джай подмигивает вам.{/n} "...Можете выразить их, подарив что-нибудь своей скромной слуге".

traits.locale_text: "But if the feelings in your soul have become a fire that is burning you up from within..." {n}Jae winks at you.{/n} "Then you may express them by bestowing a gift upon your humble servant."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But if the feelings in your soul have become a fire that is burning you up from within..." {n}Jae winks at you.{/n} "Then you may express them by bestowing a gift upon your humble servant."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But if the feelings in your soul have become a fire that is burning you up from within..." {n}Jae winks at you.{/n} "Then you may express them by bestowing a gift upon your humble servant."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But if the feelings in your soul have become a fire that is burning you up from within..." {n}Jae winks at you.{/n} "Then you may express them by bestowing a gift upon your humble servant."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Pero si los sentimientos de su alma se convierten en un fuego que le quema por dentro...». {n}Jae te guiña un ojo.{/n} «Entonces puede expresarlos mediante un regalo a su humilde sirvienta».
languages.original_text: "But if the feelings in your soul have become a fire that is burning you up from within..." {n}Jae winks at you.{/n} "Then you may express them by bestowing a gift upon your humble servant."

traits.locale_text: «Pero si los sentimientos de su alma se convierten en un fuego que le quema por dentro...». {n}Jae te guiña un ojo.{/n} «Entonces puede expresarlos mediante un regalo a su humilde sirvienta».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “不过，如果你灵魂深处的感情已经化作一团烈火，从内心深处将你点燃的话……”{n}婕伊朝你眨眨眼睛，{/n}“那么你可以通过赠送礼物的方式，向你卑微的仆人来表达爱意。”
languages.original_text: "But if the feelings in your soul have become a fire that is burning you up from within..." {n}Jae winks at you.{/n} "Then you may express them by bestowing a gift upon your humble servant."

traits.locale_text: “不过，如果你灵魂深处的感情已经化作一团烈火，从内心深处将你点燃的话……”{n}婕伊朝你眨眨眼睛，{/n}“那么你可以通过赠送礼物的方式，向你卑微的仆人来表达爱意。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「でも、もしあんたの魂の中にある感情が内側からあんたを焼き尽くす炎になっているのなら…」{n}ジェイは、あなたを見る。{/n}「あんたの謙虚な従者に贈り物を送ったりしてそれを表現したらいいさ」
languages.original_text: "But if the feelings in your soul have become a fire that is burning you up from within..." {n}Jae winks at you.{/n} "Then you may express them by bestowing a gift upon your humble servant."

traits.locale_text: 「でも、もしあんたの魂の中にある感情が内側からあんたを焼き尽くす炎になっているのなら…」{n}ジェイは、あなたを見る。{/n}「あんたの謙虚な従者に贈り物を送ったりしてそれを表現したらいいさ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Mais si d'aventure vos sentiments ont donné naissance à un brasier qui vous ronge de l'intérieur... {n}Jae vous adresse un clin d'œil.{/n} Alors, vous pouvez les exprimer en offrant un cadeau à votre humble servante. »
languages.original_text: "But if the feelings in your soul have become a fire that is burning you up from within..." {n}Jae winks at you.{/n} "Then you may express them by bestowing a gift upon your humble servant."

traits.locale_text: « Mais si d'aventure vos sentiments ont donné naissance à un brasier qui vous ronge de l'intérieur... {n}Jae vous adresse un clin d'œil.{/n} Alors, vous pouvez les exprimer en offrant un cadeau à votre humble servante. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Doch wenn die Gefühle in Eurer Seele zu einem Feuer geworden sind, das Euch von innen heraus verbrennt ..." {n}Jae zwinkert dir zu.{/n} "Dann dürft Ihr ihnen Ausdruck verleihen, indem Ihr Eurer bescheidenen Dienerin ein Geschenk macht."
languages.original_text: "But if the feelings in your soul have become a fire that is burning you up from within..." {n}Jae winks at you.{/n} "Then you may express them by bestowing a gift upon your humble servant."

traits.locale_text: "Doch wenn die Gefühle in Eurer Seele zu einem Feuer geworden sind, das Euch von innen heraus verbrennt ..." {n}Jae zwinkert dir zu.{/n} "Dann dürft Ihr ihnen Ausdruck verleihen, indem Ihr Eurer bescheidenen Dienerin ein Geschenk macht."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "But if the feelings in your soul have become a fire that is burning you up from within..." {n}Jae winks at you.{/n} "Then you may express them by bestowing a gift upon your humble servant."

languages.text: "Ruhundaki duygular, dayanılması imkânsız bir yangına dönüşürse ama..." {n}Jae göz kırpıyor.{/n} "O durumda duygularını, bu naçiz hizmetkârına bir armağan sunarak ifade etmek isteyebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "But if the feelings in your soul have become a fire that is burning you up from within..." {n}Jae winks at you.{/n} "Then you may express them by bestowing a gift upon your humble servant."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhundaki duygular, dayanılması imkânsız bir yangına dönüşürse ama..." {n}Jae göz kırpıyor.{/n} "O durumda bu duygularını, bu naçiz hizmetkârına bir armağan sunarak ifade etmek isteyebilirsin."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
